descriptionHtml:
(Google translate!)
Speedy - Mud crab - a companion, will be glad to accompany you to wear your clothes, and help in the battle! Remember, the crab is morality, he just attack anyone will not, but you will be happy to gather up flowers and catch butterflies.

Crab immortal and as you may have noticed, very fast. You can find it in Riverwood, near the sawmill, for fallen tree, as well at this point, do not forget to take a diary of the former owner.Â 

[youtube]EU8sjMJjgjA[/youtube]

4 version's! - Normal, with backpack, with Armour, with armour and backpack! Past only ONE version!

Enjoy the game!

Steam version - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=371576567
